update ezs_set_return_order set addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleteStatus = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, finshtime = #{finshtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guanliremark = #{guanliremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guanliwuliumoeny = #{guanliwuliumoeny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, orderType = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status_store = #{order_status_store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prodectname = #{prodectname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realReturnMoeny = #{realReturnMoeny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnAddress = #{returnAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnReason = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnTotal = #{returnTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, returnType = #{returnType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, set_return_no = #{set_return_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state1 = #{state1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state2 = #{state2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tmoney = #{tmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tnum = #{tnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_id = #{good_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orderForm_id = #{orderForm_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, porderForm_id = #{porderForm_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upoper_id = #{upoper_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userseller_id = #{userseller_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nowStatus = #{nowStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, porder_status_store = #{porder_status_store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allReadySend = #{allReadySend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, guanothermoeny = #{guanothermoeny,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.id, A.orderForm_id, A.addTime, A.state1, A.state2, A.`status`, A.deleteStatus, A.set_return_no, A.returnType, A.returnReason, A.remark, B.order_no, A.prodectname, A.num, A.good_id, A.returnTotal, C.price, A.userseller_id, B.user_id, A.finshtime, B.order_type FROM ezs_set_return_order A LEFT JOIN ezs_orderform B ON A.orderForm_id = B.id LEFT JOIN ezs_goods C ON A.good_id = C.id
WHERE 1=1 and B.user_id=#{userid} limit #{totalpage},10

SELECT A.id, A.orderForm_id, A.addTime, A.state1, A.state2, A.`status`, A.deleteStatus, A.set_return_no, A.returnType, A.returnReason, A.remark, B.order_no, A.prodectname, A.num, A.good_id, A.returnTotal, C.price, A.userseller_id, B.user_id, A.finshtime, B.order_type FROM ezs_set_return_order A LEFT JOIN ezs_orderform B ON A.orderForm_id = B.id LEFT JOIN ezs_goods C ON A.good_id = C.id
WHERE 1=1 and B.user_id=#{userid} limit #{totalpage},10

SELECT A.id, A.orderForm_id, A.addTime, A.state1, A.state2, A.`status`, A.deleteStatus, A.set_return_no, A.returnType, A.returnReason, A.remark, B.order_no, A.prodectname, A.num, A.good_id, A.returnTotal, C.price, A.userseller_id, B.user_id, A.finshtime, B.order_type FROM ezs_set_return_order A LEFT JOIN ezs_orderform B ON A.orderForm_id = B.id LEFT JOIN ezs_goods C ON A.good_id = C.id WHERE 1=1 and A.id=#{returnid}
